contentBlocks.title: General Requirements
items: A building must be documented to achieve energy efficiency
The energy efficiency of a building must be documented by compliance with the energy efficiency documentation requirements of this Section
The energy efficiency documentation requirements of this Section must be satisfied by either:
Compliance with the Deemed-to-Satisfy Provisions of this Section, or
Compliance with a Performance Solution that demonstrates that the energy efficiency documentation requirements of this Section are satisfied

contentBlocks.title: Documentation Requirements
items: Energy efficiency documentation must include the following:
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the building
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the building envelope
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the HVAC systems
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the lighting systems
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the power systems
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the renewable energy systems
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the energy storage systems
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the energy recovery systems
Energy efficiency documentation must include a description of the energy distribution systems

contentBlocks.title: Exemptions
items: A building that is not required to comply with the energy efficiency documentation requirements of this Section
A building that is required to comply with the energy efficiency documentation requirements of this Section but is not required to be air-conditioned
A building that is required to comply with the energy efficiency documentation requirements of this Section and is required to be air-conditioned but is not required to be mechanically ventilated

A building that is required to comply with the energy efficiency documentation requirements of this Section, is required to be air-conditioned and is required to be mechanically ventilated but is not required to have an outdoor air economy cycle

A building that is required to comply with the energy efficiency documentation requirements of this Section, is required to be air-conditioned, is required to be mechanically ventilated and is required to have an outdoor air economy cycle but is not required to have a building management system
